titleStmt.title: The povver of preaching. Or, the powerfull effects of the word truely preached, and rightly applyed as it was deliuered in one or moe sermons. By Iohn Traske, preacher of Gods word sometimes at Axmister in Deuon: afterwards at the Fleete in London: and now at Tillingham in Dengie hundred in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Traske, John, d. ca. 1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
